title: dayalEka bhratiki
sahitya:
dayalEka bhratiki  phalamEmi rAmuni dharmAtmuni dharaNijA prANanAthuni


anupallavi

  vaya su-shAsvatamani telisikAluni bhayamulEka sadA dur-vrtlaina mAnavulu


caraNam    rAmuni para vAsudEvuni nammitEkAmita phalamulu karagadamE nata 
I mahilO mahAtmulakidi telusunu shrImadAdi tyAgarAjE sAkSikEta
